content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs the system, I received a command to read a file named "best_ways_to_learn_abroad.zip", but it returned an error stating that \'NoneType\' object has no attribute \'encoding\'. Then, I executed a shell command to unzip the file and it returned the file names and dates within the archive. \n\nIn the latest development, you received a command to read a file named "best_ways_to_learn_abroad/best_ways_to_learn_abroad.txt" and it returned the best ways to learn a language abroad. You also executed a command to google "language schools in Spain".'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'your computer', 'content': 'Command google returned: ["https://letsspeakspanish.com/blog/best-spanish-schools-spain/", "https://www.gooverseas.com/language-schools/spanish/spain", "https://housinganywhere.com/Spain/best-language-schools-in-spain", "https://gogoespana.com/en/blog/best-spanish-schools-in-spain/", "https://www.donquijote.org/learn-spanish-spain/", "https://www.languagecourse.net/schools--spain.php3", "https://www.languageinternational.com/spanish-schools-spain", "https://www.goabroad.com/articles/language-study-abroad/where-to-learn-spanish-in-spain"]'}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "browse_website", "args": {"url": "https://letsspeakspanish.com/blog/best-spanish-schools-spain/", "question": "best language schools in Spain"}}}'}]
"""
